Header.Description: ECS configuration file for ECP demo tool. Created by yf.huang in March, 2016.

Group.Name: Kernal
Group.Comment: The components under 'Kernal' branch must exist in this tool.

Component.Name: KernalService
Component.Comment: Keep pangea basic ecs configuration information. Provide basic OI client services.

Component.Name: RecipeService
Component.Comment: Customized recipe service, which inplemented CCF IRecipeService interface.

ValidationRule.ErrorMessage: Chemical 1 and Chemical 2 Reclaim Time should > 0

Component.Name: PostgresBLL
Component.Comment: Database BLL (use local ip in simulation mode)

Component.Name: PostgresBLL
Component.Comment: Database BLL (use remote ip in hardware mode)

Component.Name: HistoricalDataService
Component.Comment: Historical data storage and search service

Component.Name: MaterialHistoryStorage
Component.Comment: Material process data storage and search service

Component.Name: ClickOnceServer
Component.Comment: Click once service. It is used for user to lanch GUI program from IE browser. Default address http://localhost:6666/

Component.Name: AccountService
Component.Comment: Account service. Notice that for ACM has quite different account requirements from CCF IUser server, pangea created this own account service to manage user account and privilige. Meanwhile, CCF build-in user service still exists to make CCF Cimetrix.OperatorInterface.exe work.

PrivilegeInfo.Description: initialize system, change system mode, etc
Can view matial manual move screen?

Component.Name: MaintenanceService
Component.Comment: Maintanance task service. It is used for enginners to create customized maintenance routine to monitor tool status. A Lua engine is used get and calculate variable values from CCF data server, and generate proper warning message when some conditions are triggered.

Component.Name: HeartBeatGenerator
Component.Comment: PLC heart beat generator. If C# lost heart beat over 3 seconds, PLC will execute safety logic to force close all chemicals, valves, and stop all motors.

Property.Name: ChemicalHandlingRules
Property.string: -- ACM buildin Lua functions and variables

Property.Name: ChemicalHandlingRules
Property.string: -- ACM buildin Lua functions and variables

Property.Name: ChemicalHandlingRules
Property.string: -- ACM buildin Lua functions and variables

Property.Name: ChemicalHandlingRules
Property.string: -- ACM buildin Lua functions and variables

WPFView.Name: RunWafer
WPFView.Comment: All LoadPort overview and manual LoadPort operation.

WPFView.Name: A1
WPFView.Comment: ECP process module details and manual opearation in service mode.

WPFView.Name: A2
WPFView.Comment: Clean process module details and manual opearation in service mode.

WPFView.Name: B1
WPFView.Comment: Clean process module details and manual opearation in service mode.

WPFView.Name: B2
WPFView.Comment: Clean process module details and manual opearation in service mode.

WPFView.Name: Job
WPFView.Comment: Similar with CCF Job overview screen. This screen shows all CJ, PJ data, and provides job operation interface.

Group.Name: Motor
Group.Comment: List all motion details and provide manual operation in service mode.

WPFView.Name: A1
WPFView.Comment: Diagnosis screen for PM1 chamber motions

WPFView.Name: A2
WPFView.Comment: Diagnosis screen for PM1 chamber motions

WPFView.Name: B1
WPFView.Comment: Diagnosis screen for PM1 chamber motions

WPFView.Name: B2
WPFView.Comment: Diagnosis screen for PM1 chamber motions

Group.Name: Recipe
Group.Comment: Provide recipe editor for ECP chamber, Clean chamber, and Sequencer.

Group.Name: Service
Group.Comment: Service screens for field service enginners.

Group.Name: Config
Group.Comment: Tool control parameter screen and user management screen.

WPFView.Name: Config
WPFView.Comment: Tool control parameter screen. Actually tool parameter is saved at 'C:\programdata\Pangea\{ProjectName}\Parameter\Config.cfge'
